tool.name: NCBI Entrez EFetch
tool.description: downloads data from NCBI via Entrez EFetch
tool.command:
ncbi-efetch.py --galaxy --outfile_supporting $__new_file_path__
#if $source.source_select=="file": --accessions_file "${source.accessions_file}" #else --accessions_list "${source.accessions_list}" #end if
--email $__user_email__ $split #if $db and $db is not "None": --db "${db}" #end if
--data "${data}"
--data_files_path "${data.files_path}"
--data_format "${data_format}"
--data_id "${data.id}"
tool.help:
NCBI Entrez Fetcher =======================
fetch records from NCBI via Entrez EFetch
